comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Justin

The bug has been fixed in SVN trunk. Could you please re-test your code with the latest SVN snapshot and let me know if that solved the problem for you?

Oleg

comments.author: Justin Tay
comments.body:
Hi Oleg,

Have tested with the latest in trunk and verified to be working.

description: When the DefaultRequestDirector tries to establish a route via a proxy to a https target, registered protocol interceptors aren't being called in the createTunnelToTarget method.
summary: Protocol interceptors not called when executing CONNECT methods
